tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProductQualityMonitoring (
    inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_result VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Inspections (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
inspection_date DATE,
product_id INT,
inspector_name VARCHAR,
inspection_passed BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE TestResults (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
inspection_id INT,
test_date DATE,
test_passed BOOLEAN,
test_notes TEXT);

CREATE TABLE ProductInspections (
    inspection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InspectionResults (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    result TEXT,
    remarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InspectionMetrics (
    metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name TEXT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  inspection_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  test_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  manufacturer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name TEXT,
  department TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  inspector_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspection_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  product_category TEXT,
  manufacture_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
  inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name TEXT,
  department TEXT,
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_id INT,
  test_name TEXT,
  test_result TEXT,
  test_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_id INT,
  inspector_id INT,
  history_description TEXT,
  history_date DATE
)
